name: AccessReview.Read.All
description: Allows the app to read access reviews on behalf of the signed-in user.

name: AccessReview.ReadWrite.All
description: Allows the app to read and write access reviews on behalf of the signed-in user.

name: AccessReview.ReadWrite.Membership
displayString: Manage access reviews for group and app memberships
description: Allows the app to read and write access reviews of groups and apps on behalf of the signed-in user.

name: AccessReview.Read.All
description: Allows the app to read access reviews without a signed-in user.

name: AccessReview.ReadWrite.Membership
displayString: Manage access reviews for group and app memberships
description: Allows the app to manage access reviews of groups and apps without a signed-in user.

name: AdministrativeUnit.Read.All
description: Allows the app to read administrative units and administrative unit membership on behalf of the signed-in user.

name: AdministrativeUnit.ReadWrite.All
description: Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete administrative units and manage administrative unit membership on behalf of the signed-in user.

name: AdministrativeUnit.Read.All
description: Allows the app to read administrative units and administrative unit membership without a signed-in user.

name: AdministrativeUnit.ReadWrite.All
displayString: Read and write all administrative units
description: Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete administrative units and manage administrative unit membership without a signed-in user.

name: Analytics.Read
description: Allows the app to read the signed-in user's activity statistics, such as how much time the user has spent on emails, in meetings, or in chat sessions.

name: AppCatalog.Read.All
description: Allows the app to read the apps in the app catalogs.

name: AppCatalog.ReadWrite.All
displayString: Read and write to all app catalogs
description: Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete apps in the app catalogs.

name: Application.Read.All
description: Allows the app to read applications and service principals on behalf of the signed-in user.

name: Application.ReadWrite.All
description: Allows the app to create, read, update and delete applications and service principals on behalf of the signed-in user.

name: AppRoleAssignment.ReadWrite.All
displayString: Manage app permission grants and app role assignments
description: Allows the app to manage permission grants for application permissions to any API (including Microsoft Graph) and application assignments for any app, on behalf of the signed-in user.

name: Application.Read.All
description: Allows the app to read applications and service principals without a signed-in user.

name: Application.ReadWrite.All
description: Allows the calling app to create, and manage (read, update, update application secrets and delete) applications and service principals without a signed-in user.  Does not allow management of consent grants or application assignments to users or groups.

name: Application.ReadWrite.OwnedBy
displayString: Manage apps that this app creates or owns
description: Allows the calling app to create other applications and service principals, and fully manage those applications and service principals (read, update, update application secrets and delete), without a signed-in user.  It cannot update any applications that it is not an owner of. Does not allow management of consent grants or application assignments to users or groups.

name: AppRoleAssignment.ReadWrite.All
displayString: Manage app permission grants and app role assignments
description: Allows the app to manage permission grants for application permissions to any API (including Microsoft Graph) and application assignments for any app, without a signed-in user.

name: Bookings.Read.All
displayString: Allows an app to read Bookings appointments, businesses, customers, services, and staff on behalf of the signed-in user.
description: Intended for read-only applications. Typical target user is the customer of a booking business.

name: BookingsAppointment.ReadWrite.All
displayString: Allows an app to read and write Bookings appointments and customers, and additionally allows reading businesses, services, and staff on behalf of the signed-in user.
description: Intended for scheduling applications which need to manipulate appointments and customers. Cannot change fundamental information about the booking business, nor its services and staff members. Typical target user is the customer of a booking business.

name: Bookings.ReadWrite.All
displayString: Allows an app to read and write Bookings appointments, businesses, customers, services, and staff on behalf of the signed-in user. Does not allow create, delete, or publish of Bookings businesses.
description: Intended for management applications that manipulate existing businesses, their services and staff members. Cannot create, delete, or change the publishing status of a booking business. Typical target user is the support staff of an organization.

name: Bookings.Manage.All
displayString: Allows an app to read, write, and manage Bookings appointments, businesses, customers, services, and staff on behalf of the signed-in user.
description: Allows the app to have full access. Intended for a full management experience. Typical target user is the administrator of an organization.

name: Calendars.Read
description: Allows the app to read events in user calendars.

name: Calendars.Read.Shared
description: Allows the app to read events in all calendars that the user can access, including delegate and shared calendars.

name: Calendars.ReadWrite
displayString: Have full access to user calendars
description: Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete events in user calendars.

name: Calendars.ReadWrite.Shared
displayString: Read and write user and shared calendars
description: Allows the app to create, read, update and delete events in all calendars the user has permissions to access. This includes delegate and shared calendars.

name: Calendars.Read
description: Allows the app to read events of all calendars without a signed-in user.

name: Calendars.ReadWrite
displayString: Read and write calendars in all mailboxes
description: Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete events of all calendars without a signed-in user.

name: Channel.ReadBasic.All
displayString: Read the names and descriptions of channels.
description: Read channel names and channel descriptions, on behalf of the signed-in user.

name: Channel.Create
description: Create channels in any team, on behalf of the signed-in user.

name: Channel.Delete.All
description: Delete channels in any team, on behalf of the signed-in user.

name: Channel.ReadBasic.All
displayString: Read the names and descriptions  of all channels.
description: Read all channel names and channel descriptions, without a signed-in user.

name: Channel.Create
description: Create channels in any team, without a signed-in user.

name: Channel.Delete.All
description: Delete channels in any team, without a signed-in user.

name: ChannelSettings.Read.All
displayString: Read the names, descriptions, and settings of channels.
description: Read all channel names, channel descriptions, and channel settings, on behalf of the signed-in user.

name: ChannelSettings.ReadWrite.All
displayString: Read and write the names, descriptions, and settings of channels.
description: Read and write the names, descriptions, and settings of all channels, on behalf of the signed-in user.

name: ChannelSettings.Read.All
displayString: Read the names, descriptions, and settings of all channels.
description: Read all channel names, channel descriptions, and channel settings, without a signed-in user.

name: ChannelSettings.ReadWrite.All
displayString: Read and write the names, descriptions, and settings of all channels.
description: Read and write the names, descriptions, and settings of all channels, without a signed-in user.

name: Calls.Initiate.All
displayString: Initiate outgoing 1:1 calls from the app (preview)
description: Allows the app to place outbound calls to a single user and transfer calls to users in your organization’s directory, without a signed-in user.

name: Calls.InitiateGroupCall.All
displayString: Initiate outgoing group calls from the app (preview)
description: Allows the app to place outbound calls to multiple users and add participants to meetings in your organization, without a signed-in user.

name: Calls.JoinGroupCall.All
displayString: Join group calls and meetings as an app (preview)
description: Allows the app to join group calls and scheduled meetings in your organization, without a signed-in user. The app will be joined with the privileges of a directory user to meetings in your tenant.

name: Calls.JoinGroupCallasGuest.All
displayString: Join group calls and meetings as a guest (preview)
description: Allows the app to anonymously join group calls and scheduled meetings in your organization, without a signed-in user. The app will be joined as a guest to meetings in your tenant.

name: Calls.AccessMedia.All*
displayString: Access media streams in a call as an app (preview)
description: Allows the app to get direct access to media streams in a call, without a signed-in user.

name: CallRecords.Read.All
description: Allows the app to read call records for all calls and online meetings without a signed-in user.

name: ChannelMessage.Delete (private preview)
description: Allows an app to delete channel messages in Microsoft Teams, on behalf of the signed-in user.

name: ChannelMessage.Edit (private preview)
description: Allows an app to edit channel messages in Microsoft Teams, on behalf of the signed-in user.

name: ChannelMessage.Read.All
description: Allows an app to read a channel's messages in Microsoft Teams, on behalf of the signed-in user.

name: ChannelMessage.Send
description: Allows an app to send channel messages in Microsoft Teams, on behalf of the signed-in user.

name: ChannelMessage.Read.All
description: Allows the app to read all channel messages in Microsoft Teams, without a signed-in user.

name: ChannelMessage.UpdatePolicyViolation.All
displayString: Flag channel messages for violating policy
description: Allows the app to update Microsoft Teams channel messages by patching a set of Data Loss Prevention (DLP) policy violation properties to handle the output of DLP processing.

name: ChannelMember.Read.All
description: Read the members of channels, on behalf of the signed-in user.

name: ChannelMember.ReadWrite.All
displayString: Add and remove members from channels.
description: Add and remove members from channels, on behalf of the signed-in user. Also allows changing a member's role, for example from owner to non-owner.

name: ChannelMember.Read.All
displayString: Read the members of all channels.
description: Read the members of all channels, without a signed-in user.

name: ChannelMember.ReadWrite.All
displayString: Add and remove members from all channels.
description: Add and remove members from all channels, without a signed-in user. Also allows changing a member's role, for example from owner to non-owner.

name: Chat.Read
description: Allows an app to read your 1:1 or group chat messages in Microsoft Teams, on your behalf.

name: Chat.ReadBasic
displayString: Read names and members of user chat threads
description: Allows an app to read the members and descriptions of 1:1 and group chats threads, on behalf of the signed-in user.

name: Chat.ReadWrite
displayString: Read your chat messages and send new ones
description: Allows an app to read and send your 1:1 or group chat messages in Microsoft Teams, on your behalf.

name: Chat.Send (private preview)
description: Allows an app to send 1:1 and group chat messages in Microsoft Teams, on behalf of the signed-in user.

name: Chat.Read.All
description: Allows the app to read all 1:1 or group chat messages in Microsoft Teams, without a signed-in user.

name: Chat.ReadBasic.All
displayString: Read names and members of user chat threads
description: Read names and members of all chat threads.

name: Chat.UpdatePolicyViolation.All
displayString: Flag chat messages for violating policy
description: Allows the app to update Microsoft Teams 1:1 or group chat messages by patching a set of Data Loss Prevention (DLP) policy violation properties to handle the output of DLP processing.

name: Chat.Send.All (private preview)
description: Allows an app to send 1:1 and group chat messages in Microsoft Teams without a signed-in user.

name: ChatMessage.Send (private preview)
description: Allows an app to send 1:1 and group chat messages in Microsoft Teams, on behalf of the signed-in user.

name: Contacts.Read
description: Allows the app to read user contacts.

name: Contacts.Read.Shared
description: Allows the app to read contacts that the user has permissions to access, including the user's own and shared contacts.

name: Contacts.ReadWrite
displayString: Have full access to user contacts
description: Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete user contacts.

name: Contacts.ReadWrite.Shared
displayString: Read and write user and shared contacts
description: Allows the app to create, read, update and delete contacts that the user has permissions to, including the user's own and shared contacts.

name: Contacts.Read
description: Allows the app to read all contacts in all mailboxes without a signed-in user.

name: Contacts.ReadWrite
displayString: Read and write contacts in all mailboxes
description: Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete all contacts in all mailboxes without a signed-in user.

name: Device.Read
description: Allows the app to read a user's list of devices on behalf of the signed-in user.

name: Device.Command
description: Allows the app to launch another app or communicate with another app on a user's device on behalf of the signed-in user.

name: Device.ReadWrite.All
description: Allows the app to read and write all device properties without a signed in user. Does not allow device creation, device deletion, or update of device alternative security identifiers.

name: Directory.Read.All
description: Allows the app to read data in your organization's directory, such as users, groups and apps. Note: Users may consent to applications that require this permission if the application is registered in their own organization’s tenant.

name: Directory.ReadWrite.All
description: Allows the app to read and write data in your organization's directory, such as users, and groups. It does not allow the app to delete users or groups, or reset user passwords.

name: Directory.AccessAsUser.All
displayString: Access directory as the signed-in user
description: Allows the app to have the same access to information in the directory as the signed-in user.

name: PrivilegedAccess.ReadWrite.AzureAD
displayString: Read and write Privileged Identity Management data for Directory
description: Allows the app to have read and write access to Privileged Identity Management APIs for Azure AD.

name: PrivilegedAccess.ReadWrite.AzureResources
displayString: Read and write Privileged Identity Management data for Azure Resources
description: Allows the app to have read and write access to Privileged Identity Management APIs for Azure resources.

name: Directory.Read.All
description: Allows the app to read data in your organization's directory, such as users, groups and apps, without a signed-in user.

name: Directory.ReadWrite.All
description: Allows the app to read and write data in your organization's directory, such as users, and groups, without a signed-in user. Does not allow user or group deletion.

name: Domain.ReadWrite.All
description: Allows the app to read and write domains without a signed-in user.

name: EduAdministration.Read
description: Allows the app to read education app settings on behalf of the user.

name: EduAdministration.ReadWrite
description: Allows the app to manage education app settings on behalf of the user.

name: EduAssignments.ReadBasic
displayString: Read users' class assignments without grades
description: Allows the app to read assignments without grades on behalf of the user

name: EduAssignments.ReadWriteBasic
displayString: Read and write users' class assignments without grades
description: Allows the app to read and write assignments without grades on behalf of the user

name: EduAssignments.Read
displayString: Read users' view of class assignments and their grades
description: Allows the app to read assignments and their grades on behalf of the user

name: EduAssignments.ReadWrite
displayString: Read and write users' view of class assignments and their grades
description: Allows the app to read and write assignments and their grades on behalf of the user

name: EduRoster.ReadBasic
displayString: Read a limited subset of users' view of the roster
description: Allows the app to read a limited subset of the properties from the structure of schools and classes in an organization's roster and a limited subset of properties about users to be read on behalf of the user. Includes name, status, education role, email address and photo.

name: EduRoster.Read
displayString: Read users' view of the roster
description: Allows the app to read the structure of schools and classes in an organization's roster and education-specific information about users to be read on behalf of the user.

name: EduRoster.ReadWrite
displayString: Read and write users' view of the roster
description: Allows the app to read and write the structure of schools and classes in an organization's roster and education-specific information about users to be read and written on behalf of the user.

name: EduAdministration.Read.All
description: Read the state and settings of all Microsoft education apps on behalf of the user

name: EduAdministration.ReadWrite.All
description: Manage the state and settings of all Microsoft education apps on behalf of the user

name: EduAssignments.ReadBasic.All
description: Allows the app to read assignments without grades for all users

name: EduAssignments.ReadWriteBasic.All
displayString: Read and write class assignments without grades
description: Allows the app to read and write assignments without grades for all users

name: EduAssignments.Read.All
description: Allows the app to read assignments and their grades for all users

name: EduAssignments.ReadWrite.All
displayString: Read and write class assignments with grades
description: Allows the app to read and write assignments and their grades for all users

name: EduRoster.ReadBasic.All
displayString: Read a limited subset of the organization's roster.
description: Allows the app to read a limited subset of both the structure of schools and classes in an organization's roster and education-specific information about all users.

name: EduRoster.Read.All
description: Allows the app to read the structure of schools and classes in the organization's roster and education-specific information about all users to be read.

name: EduRoster.ReadWrite.All
displayString: Read and write the organization's roster.
description: Allows the app to read and write the structure of schools and classes in the organization's roster and education-specific information about all users to be read and written.

name: EntitlementManagement.ReadWrite.All
displayString: Read and write entitlement management resources
description: Allows the app to request access to read and manage access packages and related entitlement management resources on behalf of the signed-in user.

name: EntitlementManagement.Read.All
description: Allows the app to request access to read access packages and related entitlement management resources on behalf of the signed-in user.

name: Files.Read
description: Allows the app to read the signed-in user's files.

name: Files.Read.All
displayString: Read all files that user can access
description: Allows the app to read all files the signed-in user can access.

name: Files.ReadWrite
displayString: Have full access to user files
description: Allows the app to read, create, update, and delete the signed-in user's files.

name: Files.ReadWrite.All
displayString: Have full access to all files user can access
description: Allows the app to read, create, update, and delete all files the signed-in user can access.

name: Files.ReadWrite.AppFolder
displayString: Have full access to the application's folder (preview)
description: (Preview) Allows the app to read, create, update, and delete files in the application's folder.

name: Files.Read.Selected
displayString: Read files that the user selects
description: Limited support in Microsoft Graph; see Remarks  (Preview) Allows the app to read files that the user selects. The app has access for several hours after the user selects a file.

name: Files.ReadWrite.Selected
displayString: Read and write files that the user selects
description: Limited support in Microsoft Graph; see Remarks  (Preview) Allows the app to read and write files that the user selects. The app has access for several hours after the user selects a file.

name: Files.Read.All
displayString: Read files in all site collections
description: Allows the app to read all files in all site collections without a signed in user.

name: Files.ReadWrite.All
displayString: Read and write files in all site collections
description: Allows the app to read, create, update, and delete all files in all site collections without a signed in user.

name: Financials.ReadWrite.All
description: Allows the app to read and write financials data on behalf of the signed-in user

name: Group.Read.All
description: Allows the app to list groups, and to read their properties and all group memberships on behalf of the signed-in user.  Also allows the app to read calendar, conversations, files, and other group content for all groups the signed-in user can access.

name: Group.ReadWrite.All
description: Allows the app to create groups and read all group properties and memberships on behalf of the signed-in user.  Also allows the app to read and write calendar, conversations, files, and other group content for all groups the signed-in user can access. Additionally allows group owners to manage their groups and allows group members to update group content.

name: GroupMember.Read.All
description: Allows the app to list groups, read basic group properties and read membership of all groups the signed-in user has access to.

name: GroupMember.ReadWrite.All
description: Allows the app to list groups, read basic properties, read and update the membership of the groups the signed-in user has access to. Group properties and owners cannot be updated and groups cannot be deleted.

name: Group.Read.All
description: Allows the app to read memberships for all groups without a signed-in user. Also allows the app to read calendar, conversations, files, and other group content for all groups.Note: Not all group APIs support access using app-only permissions. See known issues for examples.

name: Group.ReadWrite.All
description: Allows the app to create groups, read and update group memberships, and delete groups. Also allows the app to read and write calendar, conversations, files, and other group content for all groups. All of these operations can be performed by the app without a signed-in user.Note: Not all group APIs support access using app-only permissions. See known issues for examples.

name: Group.Selected
description: Note: This permission is exposed in the Azure portal for a feature that is not  available for general use. Do not use this permission as it is subject to change.

name: GroupMember.Read.All
description: Allows the app to read memberships and basic group properties for all groups without a signed-in user.

name: GroupMember.ReadWrite.All
description: Allows the app to list groups, read basic properties, read and update the membership of the groups this app has access to without a signed-in user. Group properties and owners cannot be updated and groups cannot be deleted.

name: Group.Create
description: Allows the calling app to create groups without a signed-in user. Does not allow read, update, or deletion of any groups.

name: IdentityProvider.Read.All
description: Allows the app to read identity providers configured in your Azure AD or Azure AD B2C tenant on behalf of the signed-in user.

name: IdentityProvider.ReadWrite.All
displayString: Read and write identity provider information
description: Allows the app to read or write identity providers configured in your Azure AD or Azure AD B2C tenant on behalf of the signed-in user.

name: IdentityRiskEvent.Read.All
description: Allows the app to read identity risk event information for all users in your organization on behalf of the signed-in user.

name: IdentityRiskEvent.Read.All
description: Allows the app to read identity risk event information for all users in your organization without a signed-in user.

name: IdentityRiskyUser.Read.All
description: Allows the app to read identity user risk information for all users in your organization on behalf of the signed-in user.

name: IdentityRiskyUser.ReadWrite.All
displayString: Read and update identity user risk  information
description: Allows the app to read and update identity user risk information for all users in your organization on behalf of the signed-in user.

name: IdentityRiskyUser.Read.All
description: Allows the app to read identity user risk information for all users in your organization without a signed-in user.

name: IdentityRiskyUser.ReadWrite.All
displayString: Read and update identity user risk  information
description: Allows the app to read and update identity user risk information for all users in your organization without a signed-in user.

name: DeviceManagementApps.Read.All
description: Allows the app to read the properties, group assignments and status of apps, app configurations and app protection policies managed by Microsoft Intune.

name: DeviceManagementApps.ReadWrite.All
displayString: Read and write Microsoft Intune apps
description: Allows the app to read and write the properties, group assignments and status of apps, app configurations and app protection policies managed by Microsoft Intune.

name: DeviceManagementConfiguration.Read.All
displayString: Read Microsoft Intune device configuration and policies
description: Allows the app to read properties of Microsoft Intune-managed device configuration and device compliance policies and their assignment to groups.

name: DeviceManagementConfiguration.ReadWrite.All
displayString: Read and write Microsoft Intune device configuration and policies
description: Allows the app to read and write properties of Microsoft Intune-managed device configuration and device compliance policies and their assignment to groups.

name: DeviceManagementManagedDevices.PrivilegedOperations.All
displayString: Perform user-impacting remote actions on Microsoft Intune devices
description: Allows the app to perform remote high impact actions such as wiping the device or resetting the passcode on devices managed by Microsoft Intune.

name: DeviceManagementManagedDevices.Read.All
description: Allows the app to read the properties of devices managed by Microsoft Intune.

name: DeviceManagementManagedDevices.ReadWrite.All
displayString: Read and write Microsoft Intune devices
description: Allows the app to read and write the properties of devices managed by Microsoft Intune. Does not allow high impact operations such as remote wipe and password reset on the device’s owner.

name: DeviceManagementRBAC.Read.All
description: Allows the app to read the properties relating to the Microsoft Intune Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) settings.

name: DeviceManagementRBAC.ReadWrite.All
displayString: Read and write Microsoft Intune RBAC settings
description: Allows the app to read and write the properties relating to the Microsoft Intune Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) settings.

name: DeviceManagementServiceConfig.Read.All
description: Allows the app to read Intune service properties including device enrollment and third party service connection configuration.

name: DeviceManagementServiceConfig.ReadWrite.All
displayString: Read and write Microsoft Intune configuration
description: Allows the app to read and write Microsoft Intune service properties including device enrollment and third party service connection configuration.

name: DeviceManagementApps.Read.All
description: Allows the app to read the properties, group assignments and status of apps, app configurations and app protection policies managed by Microsoft Intune.

name: DeviceManagementApps.ReadWrite.All
displayString: Read and write Microsoft Intune apps
description: Allows the app to read and write the properties, group assignments and status of apps, app configurations and app protection policies managed by Microsoft Intune.

name: DeviceManagementConfiguration.Read.All
displayString: Read Microsoft Intune device configuration and policies
description: Allows the app to read properties of Microsoft Intune-managed device configuration and device compliance policies and their assignment to groups.

name: DeviceManagementConfiguration.ReadWrite.All
displayString: Read and write Microsoft Intune device configuration and policies
description: Allows the app to read and write properties of Microsoft Intune-managed device configuration and device compliance policies and their assignment to groups.

name: DeviceManagementManagedDevices.PrivilegedOperations.All
displayString: Perform user-impacting remote actions on Microsoft Intune devices
description: Allows the app to perform remote high impact actions such as wiping the device or resetting the passcode on devices managed by Microsoft Intune.

name: DeviceManagementManagedDevices.Read.All
description: Allows the app to read the properties of devices managed by Microsoft Intune.

name: DeviceManagementManagedDevices.ReadWrite.All
displayString: Read and write Microsoft Intune devices
description: Allows the app to read and write the properties of devices managed by Microsoft Intune. Does not allow high impact operations such as remote wipe and password reset on the device’s owner.

name: DeviceManagementRBAC.Read.All
description: Allows the app to read the properties relating to the Microsoft Intune Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) settings.

name: DeviceManagementRBAC.ReadWrite.All
displayString: Read and write Microsoft Intune RBAC settings
description: Allows the app to read and write the properties relating to the Microsoft Intune Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) settings.

name: DeviceManagementServiceConfig.Read.All
description: Allows the app to read Intune service properties including device enrollment and third party service connection configuration.

name: DeviceManagementServiceConfig.ReadWrite.All
displayString: Read and write Microsoft Intune configuration
description: Allows the app to read and write Microsoft Intune service properties including device enrollment and third party service connection configuration.

name: Mail.Read
description: Allows the app to read email in user mailboxes.

name: Mail.ReadBasic
description: Allows the app to read email in the signed-in user's mailbox, except for body, bodyPreview, uniqueBody, attachments, extensions, and any extended properties. Does not include permissions to search messages.

name: Mail.ReadWrite
displayString: Read and write access to user mail
description: Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete email in user mailboxes. Does not include permission to send mail.

name: Mail.Read.Shared
description: Allows the app to read mail that the user can access, including the user's own and shared mail.

name: Mail.ReadWrite.Shared
displayString: Read and write user and shared mail
description: Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete mail that the user has permission to access, including the user's own and shared mail. Does not include permission to send mail.

name: Mail.Send
description: Allows the app to send mail as users in the organization.

name: Mail.Send.Shared
displayString: Send mail on behalf of others
description: Allows the app to send mail as the signed-in user, including sending on-behalf of others.

name: MailboxSettings.Read
description: Allows the app to the read user's mailbox settings. Does not include permission to send mail.

name: MailboxSettings.ReadWrite
displayString: Read and write user mailbox settings
description: Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete user's mailbox settings. Does not include permission to directly send mail, but allows the app to create rules that can forward or redirect messages.

name: Mail.Read
description: Allows the app to read mail in all mailboxes without a signed-in user.

name: Mail.ReadBasic.All
description: Allows the app to read all users mailboxes except Body, BodyPreview, UniqueBody, Attachments, ExtendedProperties, and Extensions. Does not include permissions to search messages.

name: Mail.ReadWrite
displayString: Read and write mail in all mailboxes
description: Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete mail in all mailboxes without a signed-in user. Does not include permission to send mail.

name: Mail.Send
description: Allows the app to send mail as any user without a signed-in user.

name: MailboxSettings.Read
description: Allows the app to read user's mailbox settings without a signed-in user. Does not include permission to send mail.

name: MailboxSettings.ReadWrite
displayString: Read and write all user mailbox settings
description: Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete user's mailbox settings without a signed-in user. Does not include permission to send mail.

name: Member.Read.Hidden
description: Allows the app to read the memberships of hidden groups and administrative units on behalf of the signed-in user, for those hidden groups and administrative units that the signed-in user has access to.

name: Member.Read.Hidden
description: Allows the app to read the memberships of hidden groups and administrative units without a signed-in user.

name: Notes.Read
description: Allows the app to read the titles of OneNote notebooks and sections and to create new pages, notebooks, and sections on behalf of the signed-in user.

name: Notes.Create
description: Allows the app to read the titles of OneNote notebooks and sections and to create new pages, notebooks, and sections on behalf of the signed-in user.

name: Notes.ReadWrite
displayString: Read and write user OneNote notebooks
description: Allows the app to read, share, and modify OneNote notebooks on behalf of the signed-in user.

name: Notes.Read.All
displayString: Read all OneNote notebooks that user can access
description: Allows the app to read OneNote notebooks that the signed-in user has access to in the organization.

name: Notes.ReadWrite.All
displayString: Read and write all OneNote notebooks that user can access
description: Allows the app to read, share, and modify OneNote notebooks that the signed-in user has access to in the organization.

name: Notes.ReadWrite.CreatedByApp
description: Deprecated Do not use. No privileges are granted by this permission.

name: Notes.Read.All
description: Allows the app to read all the OneNote notebooks in your organization, without a signed-in user.

name: Notes.ReadWrite.All
displayString: Read and write all OneNote notebooks
description: Allows the app to read, share, and modify all the OneNote notebooks in your organization, without a signed-in user.

name: Notifications.ReadWrite.CreatedByApp
displayString: Deliver and manage notifications for this app.
description: Allow the app to deliver its notifications on behalf of signed-in users. Also allows the app to read, update, and delete the user’s notification items for this app.

name: OnlineMeetings.Read
description: Allows an app to read online meeting details on behalf of the signed-in user.

name: OnlineMeetings.ReadWrite
description: Allows an app to create, read online meetings on behalf of the signed-in user.

name: OnlineMeetings.Read.All
displayString: Read Online Meeting details from the app
description: Allows the app to read VTC associated online meeting details in your organization without a signed-in user.

name: OnlineMeetings.ReadWrite.All
displayString: Read Online Meeting details from the app
description: Allows an app to create, read online meetings without a signed-in user.

name: OnPremisesPublishingProfiles.ReadWrite.All
description: Allows the app to manage hybrid identity service configuration by creating, viewing, updating and deleting on-premises published resources, on-premises agents and agent groups, on behalf of the signed-in user.

name: OnPremisesPublishingProfiles.ReadWrite.All
description: Allows the app to manage hybrid identity service configuration by creating, viewing, updating and deleting on-premises published resources, on-premises agents and agent groups, on behalf of the signed-in user.

name: email
description: Allows the app to read your users' primary email address.

name: offline_access
description: Allows the app to read and update user data, even when they are not currently using the app.

name: openid
description: Allows users to sign in to the app with their work or school accounts and allows the app to see basic user profile information.

name: profile
description: Allows the app to see your users' basic profile (name, picture, user name).

name: Organization.Read.All
description: Allows the app to read the organization and related resources, on behalf of the signed-in user. Related resources include things like subscribed SKUs and tenant branding information.

name: Organization.ReadWrite.All
description: Allows the app to read and write the organization and related resources, on behalf of the signed-in user. Related resources include things like subscribed SKUs and tenant branding information.

name: Organization.Read.All
description: Allows the app to read the organization and related resources, without a signed-in user. Related resources include things like subscribed SKUs and tenant branding information.

name: Organization.ReadWrite.All
description: Allows the app to read and write the organization and related resources, without a signed-in user. Related resources include things like subscribed SKUs and tenant branding information.

name: OrgContact.Read.All
description: Allows the app to read all organizational contacts on behalf of the signed-in user. These contacts are managed by the organization and are different from a user's personal contacts.

name: OrgContact.Read.All
description: Allows the app to read all organizational contacts without a signed-in user.  These contacts are managed by the organization and are different from a user's personal contacts.

name: People.Read
description: Allows the app to read a scored list of people relevant to the signed-in user. The list can include local contacts, contacts from social networking or your organization's directory, and people from recent communications (such as email and Skype).

name: People.Read.All
displayString: Read all users' relevant people lists
description: Allows the app to read a scored list of people relevant to the signed-in user or other users in the signed-in user's organization. The list can include local contacts, contacts from social networking or your organization's directory, and people from recent communications (such as email and Skype). Also allows the app to search the entire directory of the signed-in user's organization.

name: People.Read.All
displayString: Read all users' relevant people lists
description: Allows the app to read a scored list of people relevant to the signed-in user or other users in the signed-in user's organization. The list can include local contacts, contacts from social networking or your organization's directory, and people from recent communications (such as email and Skype). Also allows the app to search the entire directory of the signed-in user's organization.

name: Place.Read.All
description: Allows the app to read company places (conference rooms and room lists) set up in Exchange Online for the tenant.

name: Place.ReadWrite.All
displayString: Read and write all company places
description: Allows the app to read and write company places (conference rooms and room lists) set up in Exchange Online for the tenant.

name: Place.Read.All
description: Allows the app to read company places (conference rooms and room lists) for calendar events and other applications.

name: Policy.Read.All
description: Allows the app to read your organization's policies on behalf of the signed-in user.

name: Policy.ReadWrite.ApplicationConfiguration
displayString: Read and write your organization's application configuration policies
description: Allows the app to read and write your organization's application configuration policies on behalf of the signed-in user.

name: Policy.ReadWrite.AuthenticationFlows
displayString: Read and write your organization's authentication flow policies
description: Allows the app to read and write the authentication flow policies, on behalf of the signed-in user.

name: Policy.ReadWrite.ConditionalAccess
displayString: Read and write your organization's conditional access policies
description: Allows the app to read and write your organization's conditional access policies on behalf of the signed-in user.

name: Policy.ReadWrite.FeatureRollout
displayString: Read and write your organization's feature rollout policies
description: Allows the app to read and write your organization's feature rollout policies on behalf of the signed-in user. Includes abilities to assign and remove users and groups to rollout of a specific feature.

name: Policy.ReadWrite.TrustFramework
displayString: Read and write your organization's trust framework policies
description: Allows the app to read and write your organization's trust framework policies on behalf of the signed-in user.

name: Policy.Read.All
description: Allows the app to read all your organization's policies without a signed in user.

name: Policy.Read.ApplicationConfiguration
displayString: Read your organization's application configuration policies
description: Allows the app to read all your organization's application configuration policies without a signed in user.

name: Policy.ReadWrite.AuthenticationFlows
displayString: Read and write your organization's authentication flow policies
description: Allows the app to read and write the authentication flow policies for the tenant, without a signed in user.

name: Policy.ReadWrite.FeatureRollout
displayString: Read and write feature rollout policies
description: Allows the app to read and write feature rollout policies without a signed-in user. Includes abilities to assign and remove users and groups to rollout of a specific feature.

name: Policy.ReadWrite.TrustFramework
displayString: Read and write your organization's trust framework policies
description: Allows the app to read and write your organization's trust framework policies without a signed in user.

name: Presence.Read
description: Allows the app to read presence information on behalf of the signed-in user. Presence information includes activity, availability, status note, calendar out-of-office message, timezone and location.

name: Presence.Read.All
displayString: Read presence information of all users in your organization
description: Allows the app to read presence information of all users in the directory on behalf of the signed-in user. Presence information includes activity, availability, status note, calendar out-of-office message, timezone and location.

name: ProgramControl.Read.All
description: Allows the app to read programs on behalf of the signed-in user.

name: ProgramControl.ReadWrite.All
description: Allows the app to read and write programs on behalf of the signed-in user.

name: ProgramControl.Read.All
description: Allows the app to read programs without a signed-in user.

name: ProgramControl.ReadWrite.All
description: Allows the app to read and write programs without a signed-in user.

name: Reports.Read.All
description: Allows an app to read all service usage reports on behalf of the signed-in user. Services that provide usage reports include Office 365 and Azure Active Directory.

name: Reports.Read.All
description: Allows an app to read all service usage reports without a signed-in user. Services that provide usage reports include Office 365 and Azure Active Directory.

name: RoleManagement.Read.Directory
description: Allows the app to read the role-based access control (RBAC) settings for your company's directory, on behalf of the signed-in user.  This includes reading directory role templates, directory roles and memberships.

name: RoleManagement.ReadWrite.Directory
displayString: Read and write directory RBAC settings
description: Allows the app to read and manage the role-based access control (RBAC) settings for your company's directory, on behalf of the signed-in user. This includes instantiating directory roles and managing directory role membership, and reading directory role templates, directory roles and memberships.

name: RoleManagement.Read.Directory
description: Allows the app to read the role-based access control (RBAC) settings for your company's directory, without a signed-in user.  This includes reading directory role templates, directory roles and memberships.

name: RoleManagement.ReadWrite.Directory
displayString: Read and write all directory RBAC settings
description: Allows the app to read and manage the role-based access control (RBAC) settings for your company's directory, without a signed-in user. This includes instantiating directory roles and managing directory role membership, and reading directory role templates, directory roles and memberships.

name: Schedule.ReadWrite.All (private preview)
displayString: Read and Write Shifts service (Teams) data
description: Allows an app to read and write schedule, schedule groups, shifts, and associated entities in shifts applications without a signed-in user.

name: Schedule.Read.All (private preview)
description: Allows the app to read schedule, schedule groups, shifts, and associated entities in shifts applications without a signed-in user.

name: ExternalItem.ReadWrite.All
description: Allows an app to write external data into the indexing API.

name: ExternalItem.Read.All
description: Allows an app to read external data ingested via the Microsoft Search indexing API

name: SecurityEvents.Read.All
description: Allows the app to read your organization’s security events on behalf of the signed-in user.

name: SecurityEvents.ReadWrite.All
displayString: Read and update your organization’s security events
description: Allows the app to read your organization’s security events on behalf of the signed-in user. Also allows the app to update editable properties in security events on behalf of the signed-in user.

name: SecurityActions.Read.All
description: Allows the app to read your organization’s security actions on behalf of the signed-in user.

name: SecurityActions.ReadWrite.All
displayString: Read and update your organization's security actions
description: Allows the app to read your organization’s security actions on behalf of the signed-in user.

name: ThreatIndicators.ReadWrite.OwnedBy
displayString: Manage threat indicators this app creates or owns
description: Allows the app to create threat indicators, and fully manage those threat indicators (read, update and delete) on behalf of the signed-in user.

name: ThreatIndicators.Read.All
description: Allows the app to read your organization’s security actions on behalf of the signed-in user.

name: SecurityEvents.Read.All
description: Allows the app to read your organization’s security events.

name: SecurityEvents.ReadWrite.All
displayString: Read and update your organization’s security events
description: Allows the app to read your organization’s security events. Also allows the app to update editable properties in security events.

name: SecurityActions.Read.All
description: Allows the app to read your organization’s security actions.

name: SecurityActions.ReadWrite.All
displayString: Create and read your organization's security actions
description: Allows the app to read or create security actions, without a signed-in user.

name: ThreatIndicators.ReadWrite.OwnedBy
displayString: Manage threat indicators this app creates or owns
description: Allows the app to create threat indicators, and fully manage those threat indicators (read, update and delete), without a signed-in user.  It cannot update any threat indicators it does not own.

name: ThreatIndicators.Read.All
displayString: Manage threat indicators this app creates or owns
description: Allows the app to read all the indicators for your organization, without a signed-in user.

name: Sites.Read.All
displayString: Read items in all site collections
description: Allows the app to read documents and list items in all site collections on behalf of the signed-in user.

name: Sites.ReadWrite.All
displayString: Read and write items in all site collections
description: Allows the app to edit or delete documents and list items in all site collections on behalf of the signed-in user.

name: Sites.Manage.All
displayString: Create, edit, and delete items and lists in all site collections
description: Allows the app to manage and create lists, documents, and list items in all site collections on behalf of the signed-in user.

name: Sites.FullControl.All
displayString: Have full control of all site collections
description: Allows the app to have full control to SharePoint sites in all site collections on behalf of the signed-in user.

name: Sites.Read.All
displayString: Read items in all site collections
description: Allows the app to read documents and list items in all site collections without a signed in user.

name: Sites.ReadWrite.All
displayString: Read and write items in all site collections
description: Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete documents and list items in all site collections without a signed in user.

name: Sites.Manage.All
displayString: Create, edit, and delete items and lists in all site collections
description: Allows the app to manage and create lists, documents, and list items in all site collections without a signed-in user.

name: Sites.FullControl.All
displayString: Have full control of all site collections
description: Allows the app to have full control to SharePoint sites in all site collections without a signed-in user.

name: Tasks.Read
description: Allows the app to read user tasks.

name: Tasks.Read.Shared
description: Allows the app to read tasks a user has permissions to access, including their own and shared tasks.

name: Tasks.ReadWrite
displayString: Create, read, update and delete user tasks and containers (preview)
description: Allows the app to create, read, update and delete tasks and containers (and tasks in them) that are assigned to or shared with the signed-in user.

name: Tasks.ReadWrite.Shared
displayString: Read and write user and shared tasks (preview)
description: Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete tasks a user has permissions to, including their own and shared tasks.

name: Teams.ReadBasic.All
displayString: Read the names and descriptions of teams
description: Read the names and descriptions of teams, on behalf of the signed-in user.

name: Teams.Create (private preview)
description: Create teams, on behalf of the signed-in user.

name: Teams.ReadBasic.All
displayString: Get a list of all teams
description: Get a list of all teams, without a signed-in user.

name: Teams.Create (private preview)
description: Create teams, without a signed-in user.

name: TeamsSettings.Read.All
description: Read this team's settings, on behalf of the signed-in user.

name: TeamsSettings.ReadWrite.All
description: Read and change all teams' settings, on behalf of the signed-in user.

name: TeamsSettings.Read.All
description: Read this team's settings, without a signed-in user.

name: TeamsSettings.ReadWrite.All
displayString: Read and change all teams' settings.
description: Read and change all teams' settings, without a signed-in user.

name: TeamsActivity.Read (private preview)
description: Allows the app to read the signed-in user's teamwork activity feed.

name: TeamsActivity.Send (private preview)
displayString: Send a teamwork activity as the user
description: Allows the app to create new activities in the user's teamwork activity feed, and send new activities to other users' activity feed, on behalf of the signed-in user.

name: TeamsActivity.Read.All (private preview)
displayString: Read all users' teamwork activity feed
description: Allows the app to read all users' teamwork activity feed, without a signed-in user.

name: TeamsActivity.Send (private preview)
displayString: Send a teamwork activity to any user
description: Allows the app to send new activities to any users' teamwork activity feed, without a signed-in user.

name: TeamsApp.Read.All (Deprecated)
description: Allows the app to read the Teams apps that are installed for the signed-in user, and in all teams the user is a member of. Does not give the ability to read application-specific settings.

name: TeamsApp.ReadWrite.All (Deprecated)
description: Allows the app to read, install, upgrade, and uninstall Teams apps, on behalf of the signed-in user and also for teams the user is a member of. Does not give the ability to read or write application-specific settings.

name: TeamsApp.Read.All (Deprecated)
displayString: Read all users' installed Teams apps
description: Allows the app to read the Teams apps that are installed for any user, without a signed-in user. Does not give the ability to read application-specific settings.

name: TeamsApp.ReadWrite.All (Deprecated)
description: Allows the app to read, install, upgrade, and uninstall Teams apps for any user, without a signed-in user. Does not give the ability to read or write application-specific settings.

name: TeamMember.Read.All
description: Read the members of teams, on behalf of the signed-in user.

name: TeamMember.ReadWrite.All
displayString: Add and remove members from teams.
description: Add and remove members from teams, on behalf of the signed-in user. Also allows changing a member's role, for example from owner to non-owner.

name: TeamMember.Read.All
displayString: Read the members of all teams.
description: Read the members of all teams, without a signed-in user.

name: TeamMember.ReadWrite.All
displayString: Add and remove members from all teams.
description: Add and remove members from all teams, without a signed-in user. Also allows changing a team member's role, for example from owner to non-owner.

name: TeamsTab.Read.All
description: Allows the app to read the Teams apps that are installed for the signed-in user, and in all teams the user is a member of. Does not give the ability to read application-specific settings.

name: TeamsTab.ReadWrite.All
displayString: Read and write tabs in Microsoft Teams.
description: Allows the app to read, install, upgrade, and uninstall Teams apps, on behalf of the signed-in user and also for teams the user is a member of. Does not give the ability to read or write application-specific settings.

name: TeamsTab.Create
description: Allows the app to create tabs in any team in Microsoft Teams, on behalf of the signed-in user. This does not grant the ability to read, modify or delete tabs after they are created, or give access to the content inside the tabs.

name: TeamsTab.Read.All
description: Read the names and settings of tabs inside any team in Microsoft Teams, without a signed-in user. This does not give access to the content inside the tabs.

name: TeamsTab.ReadWrite.All
displayString: Read and write tabs in Microsoft Teams.
description: Read and write tabs in any team in Microsoft Teams, without a signed-in user. This does not give access to the content inside the tabs.

name: TeamsTab.Create
description: Allows the app to create tabs in any team in Microsoft Teams, without a signed-in user. This does not grant the ability to read, modify or delete tabs after they are created, or give access to the content inside the tabs.

name: Agreement.Read.All
displayString: Read all terms of use agreements
description: Allows the app to read terms of use agreements on behalf of the signed-in user.

name: Agreement.ReadWrite.All
displayString: Read and write all terms of use agreements
description: Allows the app to read and write terms of use agreements on behalf of the signed-in user.

name: AgreementAcceptance.Read
displayString: Read user terms of use acceptance statuses
description: Allows the app to read terms of use acceptance statuses on behalf of the signed-in user.

name: AgreementAcceptance.Read.All
displayString: Read terms of use acceptance statuses that user can access
description: Allows the app to read terms of use acceptance statuses on behalf of the signed-in user.

name: ThreatAssessment.ReadWrite.All
displayString: Read and write threat assessment requests
description: Allows an app to read your organization's threat assessment requests on behalf of the signed-in user. Also allows the app to create new requests to assess threats received by your organization on behalf of the signed-in user.

name: ThreatAssessment.Read.All
description: Allows an app to read your organization's threat assessment requests, without a signed-in user.

name: User.Read
description: Allows users to sign-in to the app, and allows the app to read the profile of signed-in users. It also allows the app to read basic company information of signed-in users.

name: User.ReadWrite
displayString: Read and write access to user profile
description: Allows the app to read the signed-in user's full profile. It also allows the app to update the signed-in user's profile information on their behalf.

name: User.ReadBasic.All
description: Allows the app to read a basic set of profile properties of other users in your organization on behalf of the signed-in user. This includes display name, first and last name, email address, open extensions and photo. Also allows the app to read the full profile of the signed-in user.

name: User.Read.All
description: Allows the app to read the full set of profile properties, reports, and managers of other users in your organization, on behalf of the signed-in user.

name: User.ReadWrite.All
displayString: Read and write all users' full profiles
description: Allows the app to read and write the full set of profile properties, reports, and managers of other users in your organization, on behalf of the signed-in user. Also allows the app to create and delete users as well as reset user passwords on behalf of the signed-in user.

name: User.Invite.All
displayString: Invite guest users to the organization
description: Allows the app to invite guest users to your organization, on behalf of the signed-in user.

name: User.Export.All
description: Allows the app to export an organizational user's data, when performed by a Company Administrator.

name: User.ManageIdentities.All
description: Allows an application to read, update and delete identities that are associated with a user's account, that the signed-in user has access to. This controls which identities your users can sign-in with.

name: User.Read.All
description: Allows the app to read the full set of profile properties, group membership, reports and managers of other users in your organization, without a signed-in user.

name: User.ReadWrite.All
displayString: Read and write all users' full profiles
description: Allows the app to read and write the full set of profile properties, group membership, reports and managers of other users in your organization, without a signed-in user.  Also allows the app to create and delete non-administrative users. Does not allow reset of user passwords.

name: User.Invite.All
displayString: Invite guest users to the organization
description: Allows the app to invite guest users to your organization, without a signed-in user.

name: User.Export.All
description: Allows the app to export organizational users' data, without a signed-in user.

name: User.ManageIdentities.All
description: Allows an application to read, update and delete identities that are associated with a user's account, without a signed in user. This controls which identities users can sign-in with.

name: UserActivity.ReadWrite.CreatedByApp
displayString: Read and write app activity to users' activity feed
description: Allows the app to read and report the signed-in user's activity in the app.

name: UserAuthenticationMethod.Read (preview)
description: Allows the app to read the signed-in user's authentication methods, including phone numbers and Authenticator app settings. This does not allow the app to see secret information like the signed-in user's passwords, or to sign-in or otherwise use the signed-in user's authentication methods.

name: UserAuthenticationMethod.Read.All (preview)
description: Allows the app to read authentication methods of all users in your organization that the signed-in user has access to. Authentication methods include things like a user’s phone numbers and Authenticator app settings. This does not allow the app to see secret information like passwords, or to sign-in or otherwise use the authentication methods.

name: UserAuthenticationMethod.ReadWrite (preview)
description: Allows the app to read and write the signed-in user's authentication methods, including phone numbers and Authenticator app settings. This does not allow the app to see secret information like the signed-in user's passwords, or to sign-in or otherwise use the signed-in user's authentication methods.

name: UserAuthenticationMethod.ReadWrite.All (preview)
description: Allows the app to read and write authentication methods of all users in your organization that the signed-in user has access to. Authentication methods include things like a user’s phone numbers and Authenticator app settings. This does not allow the app to see secret information like passwords, or to sign-in or otherwise use the authentication methods.

name: UserAuthenticationMethod.Read.All (private preview)
description: Allows the app to read authentication methods of all users in your organization, without a signed-in user. Authentication methods include things like a user’s phone numbers and Authenticator app settings. This does not allow the app to see secret information like passwords, or to sign-in or otherwise use the authentication methods.

name: UserAuthenticationMethod.ReadWrite.All (private preview)
description: Allows the application to read and write authentication methods of all users in your organization, without a signed-in user. Authentication methods include things like a user’s phone numbers and Authenticator app settings. This does not allow the app to see secret information like passwords, or to sign-in or otherwise use the authentication methods.
